articles.title: Cambridge children will have 'visible' role at Jubilee celebrations - Daily Mail
articles.description: William and Kate's children will take a 'visible' part in the celebrations to mark the monarch's 70th year on the throne, as part of a 'royal show of force', according to the Telegraph .
articles.content:

articles.author: Chloe Davies
articles.title: Kate and William dubbed 'world’s most glamorous royals' after Cambridge 'blunders' savaged - Express
articles.description: A ROYAL commentator has backed the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge and described them as the 'most in-demand' of the royals despite a Royal Family branding expert claiming their royal tour was plagued with 'missteps and blunders'.
